 Previously, we were able to use IPs to specify remote hosts, but since  (specifically <denchmark-link:https://github.com/horovod/horovod/pull/1181/files#diff-202497121925143c32fd281b782c3d52R347-R363>#1181</denchmark-link>
 ) it seems that this functionality was removed. It's more convenient for us to continue to use raw IPs, so would it be possible to bring that functionality back?
